overview:
Peter Green is the Senior Vice President of Sales at Undertone Networks. Most recently Peter served as Senior Vice President of Ad Sales for Weather.com. In this role, Green had overall responsibility for the success of the websiteâ€™s sales organization with offices in Atlanta, Chicago, Dallas, Detroit, Los Angeles, and New York. Under Peterâ€™s leadership Weather.comâ€™s revenue grew to over $100mm in 2007 following growth of over 38% in 2006. In 2005 and 2006 Weather.com was ranked the #1 National interactive sales organization by Jack Meyers and Associates. Peter had led those efforts for the New York territory before moving into the position of Senior Vice President at Undertone.

Prior to joining The Weather Channel in 1999, Green was as an associate publisher with McGraw Hill Publishing and served as a Vice President and Publisher for Institutional Investor Magazine group where he held various positions dedicated to international business and launched Infrastructure Finance magazine. He was also previously employed by Intercontinental Publications where he was President of Sales.

via: Undertone Networks
